requirements: Obtain the "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies" and become a free-spirited musician.
primo: Complete To the Winds of Freedom.

description: A Treatise on the Fundamental Principles of Lyre Playing
requirements: Complete all "Introductory Exercises" in the "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies."
Redeem 1 score themes in the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies."
Redeem 3 score themes in the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies."
Redeem 5 score themes in the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies."
Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 5 different official music scores.
Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 15 different official music scores.
Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 30 different official music scores.
Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 5 different music scores by other players.
Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 10 different music scores by other players.
Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 20 different music scores by other players.
